column4: 'net usershare' returned error 255: net usershare add: failed to add share pictures. Error was Operation not permitted
anyone know how to fix that error
i am trying to fileshare and i get this message
'net usershare' returned error 255: net usershare add: failed to add share pictures. Error was Operation not permitted
can anyone help me with a file sharing question ?
you're sharing files over local network(lan)?
have you installed samba?
you mean, you can share with one user but not another from the same machine?
both user administrator?
that means current user doesn't have permission.
let me check something. brb.
run this command without the quotes "id madmn"
the file/folder your'e trying to share, what's it's permission say? which group and user it belongs to?
right click on it and from properties you can see.
and you're having problem sharing this file/folder from your "shane" account. but you can share files/folders when you're logged in as another user?
try this "chown -R madmn:madmn /home/madmn/Pictures"
try this two commands one after another: "sudo chown -R madmn:madmn /home/madmn/Pictures" and "sudo chmod -R u+rwX /home/madmn/Pictures"
go to System>
go to System>Administration>Samba and preferences>samba user. see if madmn is there or not.
in samba go to preferences>samba user.
two ques. tell me the directory you're trying to share. you can't find system>administration>samba?
are your trying to share a file/folder which is in a mounted ntfs partition>
did you try the command chmod and chown i wrote before?
follow sacarlson
